description: These emojis are also scratching their heads in confusion. They’re just using a Greek ∑ for a hand. Due to the nature of this character, if you use it for the scratching hand then you have to place it on the left side of the emoticon so that the hand is actually on the head. You will see this is true for every emote in this list. ∑(O_O；) Σ(‘◉⌓◉’) Σ(-᷅_-᷄๑) Σ(ＴωＴ) Σ(●ꉺ▱ꉺ●) Σ”(⚙♊⚙ﾉ)ﾉ Σ(‘◉⌓◉’) ∑（｡･Д･｡）??? ∑(⌒◇⌒；) Σ(๛д๛) Σ(･ิ¬･ิ) Σ(´д｀;) Σʕﾟᴥﾟﾉʔﾉ Σ(`‐ｪ‐´) Σ(´д ` ﾒ) Σ(・Д・)!? Σ(￣ロ￣lll) ∑(ﾟ台ﾟlll Σ(￣□￣lll) Σ（￣□￣；） Σ([email protected])!? Σ(ﾟﾛ､ﾟ;) ∑(´ﾟωﾟ｀*) Σ(； ･`д･´) Σ(;･益･;;;)!!! ∑（´△｀○） Σ(´△｀Ⅲ) Σ(•’╻’• ۶)۶
title: Head Scratching With a ∑
